name: SpIder (itch) (AndyOfEarth)
description:
If the game won't play on your browser, you can download the executable below

_____________________________________

In the year 20XX, humanity has reached the stars and is planning to go beyond the solar system. Space promags around the world have decided to send probes out to the greater reaches of space to find hospitable planets for humans to colonize. One such probe is the SpIder probe, an eight legged rover resembling the common house pest. With the ability to manipulate it's own gravity, the SpIder can cling on to the surface of anything, making it ideal to traverse through the environments of all kinds of different planets. However before the SpIder can even be sent out, it must be able to navigate through a series of field tests that the scientists have devised for it. Will SpIder be able to complete these tests?

_____________________________________

How To Play: 

WASD: Move character

Space: Jump

Esc: Pause
